alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264 (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact areas near Kykotsmovi Village through 545 PM MST... At 458 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kykotsmovi Village, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hard Rock, Second Mesa, Hotevilla, Shongopovi, Kykotsmovi Village and Hopi Reservation. This includes the following highways... State Route 264 between mile markers 361 and 385. State Route 87 between mile markers 401 and 406. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to minor flooding and muddy roads. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded or muddy roadways.

area.areaDesc: Black Mesa Area; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264
